argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_breq1 | |- ( A = 0H -> ( A <oH ( B vH C ) <-> 0H <oH ( B vH C ) ) ) |
